title: Emunah with the Kindervelt Storybook & CD- Yiddish
The Gilded Cage
description: Dramatic events and fascinating adventures come to life in the pages of this book. We follow young Usher as he learns to recognize the truth. Together with him, you will come to appreciate the distance that must be placed between a Yid and the nations of the world.

title: The Oil Mystery
description: This book will take you on a dramatic journey riddled with mystery and suspense. The twists and turns will take you by surprise, while strong messages of Emunah and integrity will accompany you through the pages.

title: Winter with the Kindervelt Storybook - English
Winter with the Kindervelt Storybook - English
Pesach With The KinderVelt DVD
description:
A LIVE Kindervelt 3D Experience!
Celebrate Pesach like never before with this immersive 3D Kindervelt experience!
Join the Kindervelt kinderlach as they prepare for Pesach—cleaning, cooking, and getting ready for the big night. Watch them as they celebrate a beautiful Seder and enjoy a fun-filled Chol Hamoed together!
This unique and engaging adventure is one your children will want to watch again and again—keeping them entertained while you get ready for Yom Tov.
Purchase Options:When buying the DVD on our website, you can choose between a physical copy or a digital download.
If you select the digital download, you will receive an email after checkout with a link to download the HD video file.

title: Der Alef-Beis Velt DVD
description:
Der Alef-Beis Velt – DVD Edition
Bring a beloved classic to life! Der Alef-Beis Velt has been teaching generations of children their א-ב in a warm, engaging way. Now, for the first time, this timeless book has been beautifully transformed into a fully updated 3D animated DVD.
With bright characters, lively visuals, and an interactive feel, this upgraded edition makes learning the Alef-Beis fun, exciting, and unforgettable. Children will enjoy every moment as they explore the letters in a way that captures their imagination and keeps them coming back for more.
A perfect blend of nostalgia and modern creativity—ideal for everyone, and its a beautiful gift.
Available Now: When purchasing through our website, you can choose between a physical DVD or a digital download.
If you select the digital download, you’ll receive an email after checkout with a secure link to download the full HD video.

title: Kindervelt Bucket 1
description:
Kindervelt Bucket 1 – 20 Figure Set!
Bring endless imagination and Yiddishkeit into your child's playtime with Kindervelt Bucket 1 – the ultimate collection of 20 beautifully crafted, Heimishe toy figures!
This exclusive set includes a wide variety of realistic and adorable characters: men, women, children, babies, and even specialty figures like a chosson, kallah, and workers – perfect for creating your own vibrant Yiddishe community.
What's Inside:


20 detailed, colorful toy figures


A mix of boys, girls, men, women, babies, and professionals


Perfect for role-playing family life, school, shul, simchos, and more!


Figures are safe, durable, and sized just right for small hands


 Great for:


Imaginative play


Educational storytelling


Classroom use


Gifts and party favors


Let your children build, explore, and grow with Kindervelt Bucket 1 – where every figure tells a story!
Packaged in a sturdy, reusable bucket for easy cleanup and storage.
